2805.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_IN_INDEPENDENT_SERVICE
2805.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2805.short_description: Your PNID is permanently banned from this service.
2805.long_description: The account you are trying to use has been permanently banned from this service for breaking the rules.
2805.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned.
2805.long_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
